item.title: BOINC cli for World Community Grid
item.description: {%- include toc.html -%} BOINC - Berkeley Open Infrastructure for Network Computing BOINC is a distributed [grid] computing client that uses idle time on your computer. There are a number of projects that you can attach to and assist with. I will cover how to connect to the World Community Grid via CLI on Ubuntu. World Community Grid World Community Grid’s mission is to create the world’s largest public computing grid to tackle projects that benefit humanity.
